Title: Requiem
Plot: Mulder and Scully return to the town of their first X-Files investigation where a UFO has crashed in the forest. The Cigarette-Smoking Man arranges for Krycek to be released from prison in order for him to make contact with the aliens and begin rebuilding the "Project", while Scully's health appears to be taking a turn.
GuestStars: Brian Thompson, Peter MacDissi, Grace Demontesquiou, Kelly Demontesquiou, Leon Russom, Andy Umberger, Sarah Koskoff, Gretchen Becker, Darin Cooper, Eddie Kaye Thomas, Judd Trichter, Grace and Kelly de Montesquio
